title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A story about a woman who finds herself in a magical library between life and death.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who grew up in a survivalist family and later earned a PhD from Cambridge.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: Explores the journey of Homo sapiens from early evolution to the modern world.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A fable about following your dreams and listening to your heart.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life by caring less about the wrong things.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A coming-of-age mystery set in the marshes of North Carolina.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: Rules for focused success in a distracted world.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A gripping psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after a violent crime.

title: Ikigai: The Japanese Secret to a Long and Happy Life
author: Héctor García & Francesc Miralles
description: Explores the Japanese concept of Ikigai and how it can bring purpose and happiness.
